title: Strawberry and white chocolate cheesecake
description: This delectable cheesecake uses seasonal strawberries and a fancy but easy decoration technique.
ingredients: 750g/1½lb strawberries, hulls removed, cut in half
2 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water
2-3 tbsp fruit liqueur, brandy or whisky
1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways, seeds scraped out
